mapper.insert: insert into DS_BASE_LOGIN (ID, LOGINTIME, LOGOUTTIME, TICKET, IP, ACCOUNT, NAME, STATUS) values (#{id}, #{logintime}, #{logouttime}, #{ticket}, #{ip}, #{account}, #{name}, #{status})
mapper.update: update DS_BASE_LOGIN set LOGOUTTIME=#{logouttime}, TIMEOUTTIME=#{timeouttime}, PWDTIME=#{pwdtime} where TICKET=#{ticket}
